program
    int A, B, C;
    int X, Y, Z;
    int I;
begin
    A = 100;
    B = 3;
    C = 50;
    I = 50;
    read X;
    read Y;
    read Z;
    while [[(A > X) || (A <= X)] && (I > 1)] loop
        if (Y <= 7) then
            B = A + 100;
            Y = Z + B;
        else
            if (B < C) then
                A = A - 10;
            else
                A = A + 10;
            end;
        end;
        if ![((B + C * 3) < (((X - Y) + 10) - I)) || [(A != (B * C)) && (I < 25)]] then
            A = I * 2;
        else
            A = A + 1;
        end;
        B = 20 - 5;
        while [(B < C) && (B > 0)] loop
            B = B + 1;
            C = C - 1;
            X = X + 5;
            if (B == C) then
                A = A * 2;
            end;
        end;
        I = I - 1; 
    end;
    write A, B, C;
    write X, Y, Z;
    write I;
end
